item.description:
Modifying an IKEA Tr책dfri mains switch to become a potential free/non voltage relay, using only two components, even leaving the mains outlet free for other use.

The IKEA Tr책dfri (or Tradfri) smart home system is inexpensive and widely available, but limited in functionality. If you want more, for instance a simple relay (not connected to mains), you need to get it somewhere else, often necessitating the install of another Zigbee controller in addition to the IKEA one. Instead, I modified a Tr책dfri outlet switch to become a potential free relay to control the garage door.
